title: NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS EXERCISE FOR PRESENCE / DR. PARET'S MASTERCLASS
description:
This video was captured in France, where Dr. Marco Paret's non-verbal hypnosis masterclass took place. His students are doing an exercise for presence, where they master the awareness of their gravity and what surrounds them. Non-verbal hypnosis exercises are very important for achieving better results with ourselves and clients. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
